org.svvrl.goal.core.util
Class Permutation<T>

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.util.Permutation<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of elements
public class Permutation<T>
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides methods for computing all permutations of an array (with size smaller than 17) based on [E. W. Dijkstra, A Discipline of Programming, Prentice-Hall, 1976, p.71].

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

Constructor Summary
Permutation(T[] s, java.util.Comparator<T> c)
          Constructor with an array to be permuted and a comparator for comparing elements in the array.
 
Method Summary
 java.util.List<T> getNext()
          Returns the next permutation.
 boolean hasNext()
          Returns true if there are permutations not generated.
